title: Opening Times
text:
The Botanic Gardens are open from 7.00am till dusk daily however the specific
facilities within the park are subject to opening times.
 
[Glasshouses:](map/map1.html?id=3) 10.00am – 6.00pm (4.15pm in winter)
 
[Visitor Centre:](map/map1.html?id=1) 11.00am – 4.00pm

[Toilets:](map/map1.html?id=50) 10.00am – dusk (this varies through the year)
